https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mvstNgM68EyCRWwpArakLhWvvtk.jpg Along with his young son, Ji-ho, Woo-jin misses his wife Soo-a, who died after promising to return a year later with the rainy season. Miraculously, they reunite with Soo-a when the rainy season comes around, but she has no memory of her husband and son whom she dearly loved. Be with You
